<li id="cite_note-共产党宣言-4"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-共产党宣言_4-0"><sup><b>4.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-共产党宣言_4-1"><sup><b>4.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-共产党宣言_4-2"><sup><b>4.2</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-共产党宣言_4-3"><sup><b>4.3</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-共产党宣言_4-4"><sup><b>4.4</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">卡尔·马克思和<a href="/wiki/%E5%BC%97%E9%87%8C%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%B8%8C%C2%B7%E6%81%A9%E6%A0%BC%E6%96%AF" title="弗里德里希·恩格斯">弗里德里希·恩格斯</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=rRf56dMiudAC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW" rel="nofollow">《共产党宣言》（The Communist Manifesto）</a>. Echo Library. 2009-01-01: 全册 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2015-05-09</span>]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1406851748" title="Special:网络书源/978-1406851748"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1406851748</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114931/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=rRf56dMiudAC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021-02-01） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>. <q>First published in 1848, "The Communist Manifest" is one of the world's most influential political tracts. Commissioned by the Communist League and written by communist theorists Karl Marx and Friedrich Engels, it laid out the League's purposes and program.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%8D%A1%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E5%92%8C%E5%BC%97%E9%87%8C%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%B8%8C%C2%B7%E6%81%A9%E6%A0%BC%E6%96%AF&amp;rft.btitle=%E3%80%8A%E5%85%B1%E7%94%A2%E9%BB%A8%E5%AE%A3%E8%A8%80%E3%80%8B%EF%BC%88The+Communist+Manifesto%EF%BC%89&amp;rft.date=2009-01-01&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-1406851748&amp;rft.pages=%E5%85%A8%E5%86%8C&amp;rft.pub=Echo+Library&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DrRf56dMiudAC%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-马克思_全册-5"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-马克思_全册_5-0"><sup><b>5.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-马克思_全册_5-1"><sup><b>5.1</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">马克思. <a class="external text" href="https://book.douban.com/subject/1014722/" rel="nofollow">《资本论》节选本</a>. 北京: 人民出版社. 1998-12: 全册 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2016-10-02</span>]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/9787010027470" title="Special:网络书源/9787010027470"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 9787010027470</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114236/https://book.douban.com/subject/1014722/" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021-02-01） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（中国大陆）网页">（中文（中国大陆））</span>. <q>《资本论》是马克思用毕生精力写成的一部具有划时代意义的经济学巨着。其中第一卷研究资本的生产过程，第二卷研究资本的流通过程，第三卷分析资本主义生产的总过程。</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.btitle=%E3%80%8A%E8%B5%84%E6%9C%AC%E8%AE%BA%E3%80%8B%E8%8A%82%E9%80%89%E6%9C%AC&amp;rft.date=1998-12&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=9787010027470&amp;rft.pages=%E5%85%A8%E5%86%8C&amp;rft.place=%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC&amp;rft.pub=%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbook.douban.com%2Fsubject%2F1014722%2F&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-12"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-12">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%A5%88%E7%B6%AD%E4%BF%A1" title="祈维信">祈维信</a>. <a class="external text" href="http://www.dailymail.co.uk/home/moslive/article-2014647/Karl-Marx-John-Maynard-Keynes-Ten-greatest-economists-Vince-Cable.html" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx to John Maynard Keynes: Ten of the greatest economists by Vince Cable</a>. 《<a href="/wiki/%E6%AF%8F%E6%97%A5%E9%83%B5%E5%A0%B1" title="每日邮报">每日邮报</a>》. 2011-07-16 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20180708121130/http://www.dailymail.co.uk/home/moslive/article-2014647/Karl-Marx-John-Maynard-Keynes-Ten-greatest-economists-Vince-Cable.html" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2018-07-08） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E7%A5%88%E7%B6%AD%E4%BF%A1&amp;rft.btitle=Karl+Marx+to+John+Maynard+Keynes%3A+Ten+of+the+greatest+economists+by+Vince+Cable&amp;rft.date=2011-07-16&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E3%80%8A%E6%AF%8F%E6%97%A5%E9%83%B5%E5%A0%B1%E3%80%8B&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.dailymail.co.uk%2Fhome%2Fmoslive%2Farticle-2014647%2FKarl-Marx-John-Maynard-Keynes-Ten-greatest-economists-Vince-Cable.html&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-13"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-13">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%BD%97%E4%BC%AF%E6%89%98%C2%B7%E6%9B%BC%E6%A0%BC%E8%B4%9D%E6%8B%89%C2%B7%E6%98%82%E6%A0%BC" title="罗伯托·曼格贝拉·昂格">罗伯托·曼格贝拉·昂格</a>. <a class="external text" href="http://press.princeton.edu/chapters/s_8473.pdf" rel="nofollow">Free Trade Reimagined: The World Division of Labor and the Method of Economics</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20160604104530/http://press.princeton.edu/chapters/s_8473.pdf" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）. 美国普林斯顿: <a href="/wiki/%E6%99%AE%E6%9E%97%E6%96%AF%E9%A0%93%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="普林斯顿大学出版社">普林斯顿大学出版社</a>. 2007年 [2015年5月9日] <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-14"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-14">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a href="/wiki/%E7%BA%A6%E7%BF%B0%C2%B7%E5%B8%8C%E5%85%8B%E6%96%AF" title="约翰·希克斯">约翰·希克斯</a>. <a class="external text" href="http://www.jstor.org/stable/1816058?seq=1#page_scan_tab_contents" rel="nofollow">Capital Controversies: Ancient and Modern</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20210103022631/http://www.jstor.org/stable/1816058?seq=1#page_scan_tab_contents" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）. 美国纳许维尔: 《<a href="/wiki/%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E7%B6%93%E6%BF%9F%E8%A9%95%E8%AB%96" title="美国经济评论">美国经济评论</a>》. 1974年5月: 第307页 [2015-05-09] <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span>. "The greatest economists, Smith or Marx or Keynes, have changed the course of history……"</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-15"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-15">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E7%BA%A6%E7%91%9F%E5%A4%AB%C2%B7%E7%86%8A%E5%BD%BC%E7%89%B9" title="约瑟夫·熊彼特">约瑟夫·熊彼特</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=2NqJAgAAQBAJ&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Ten Great Economists</a>. 英国伦敦: <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%BE%85%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%A5%87" title="罗德里奇">罗德里奇</a>. 1997-11-06 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2015-05-09</span>]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0415110785" title="Special:网络书源/978-0415110785"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0415110785</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114304/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=2NqJAgAAQBAJ&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021-02-01） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E7%B4%84%E7%91%9F%E5%A4%AB%C2%B7%E7%86%8A%E5%BD%BC%E7%89%B9&amp;rft.btitle=Ten+Great+Economists&amp;rft.date=1997-11-06&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0415110785&amp;rft.place=%E8%8B%B1%E5%9C%8B%E5%80%AB%E6%95%A6&amp;rft.pub=%E7%BE%85%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%A5%87&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3D2NqJAgAAQBAJ%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-16"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-16">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="http://philosophy.hk01.com/%E8%B6%A3%E5%91%B3%E8%B2%BC%E5%9C%96/49651/%E3%80%90%E7%84%A1%E7%9D%A1%E6%84%8F%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8%E8%AA%B2%E3%80%91%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%EF%BC%88%E4%B8%8A%EF%BC%89%EF%BC%9A%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC%E4%B8%BB%E7%BE%A9%E7%9A%84%E5%8D%B1%E6%A9%9F" rel="nofollow">【无睡意哲学课】马克思（上）：资本主义的危机</a>. 张恩源. 2016-10-20 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2016-10-02</span>]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20161023124835/http://philosophy.hk01.com/%E8%B6%A3%E5%91%B3%E8%B2%BC%E5%9C%96/49651/%E3%80%90%E7%84%A1%E7%9D%A1%E6%84%8F%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8%E8%AA%B2%E3%80%91%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%EF%BC%88%E4%B8%8A%EF%BC%89%EF%BC%9A%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC%E4%B8%BB%E7%BE%A9%E7%9A%84%E5%8D%B1%E6%A9%9F" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2016-10-23） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（中国大陆）网页">（中文（中国大陆））</span>. <q>卡尔．马克思（Karl Marx，1818-1883）生前从未自称「社会学家」，相反，他对「社会学」一词的发明者孔德(Auguste Comte)有着无情的嘲讽与蔑视。然而，<b>马克思还是被公认为当代社会（科）学的重要鼻祖</b>，大量的社会学概念与方法源自对他的回应。他的思想纵跨三个世纪，横扫东方西方，至今活力不减，火力未衰。</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.btitle=%E3%80%90%E7%84%A1%E7%9D%A1%E6%84%8F%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8%E8%AA%B2%E3%80%91%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%EF%BC%88%E4%B8%8A%EF%BC%89%EF%BC%9A%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC%E4%B8%BB%E7%BE%A9%E7%9A%84%E5%8D%B1%E6%A9%9F&amp;rft.date=2016-10-20&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E5%BC%B5%E6%81%A9%E6%BA%90&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fphilosophy.hk01.com%2F%25E8%25B6%25A3%25E5%2591%25B3%25E8%25B2%25BC%25E5%259C%2596%2F49651%2F%25E3%2580%2590%25E7%2584%25A1%25E7%259D%25A1%25E6%2584%258F%25E5%2593%25B2%25E5%25AD%25B8%25E8%25AA%25B2%25E3%2580%2591%25E9%25A6%25AC%25E5%2585%258B%25E6%2580%259D%25EF%25BC%2588%25E4%25B8%258A%25EF%25BC%2589%25EF%25BC%259A%25E8%25B3%2587%25E6%259C%25AC%25E4%25B8%25BB%25E7%25BE%25A9%25E7%259A%2584%25E5%258D%25B1%25E6%25A9%259F&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-17"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-17">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://www.uni-bonn.de/einrichtungen/universitaetsverwaltung/organisationsplan/archiv/universitaetsmuseum/marxchinesisch" rel="nofollow">卡尔·马克思波恩的求学之路</a>.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2016-10-02</span>]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20200925235305/https://www.uni-bonn.de/einrichtungen/universitaetsverwaltung/organisationsplan/archiv/universitaetsmuseum/marxchinesisch" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2020-09-25） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（中国大陆）网页">（中文（中国大陆））</span>. <q>1835年10月，卡尔·马克思中学毕业来到波恩，并且在波恩大学的法学专业注册。鉴于受当时“迫害民众领袖运动”的影响，普鲁士政府压制当时思想上的民主意识。因此，学生是不允许有政治倾向的。在这一做法上，波恩大学较其他大学没有明显的区别。禁止大学学生联合会也是国家思想禁锢的手段之一。因此，当 1835 至 1836 年冬季学期马克思开始他在波恩大学的学习时，大学中并没有官方大学生联合会组织的。尽管如此，学生们还是为了一同出游或者是为了便于决斗而在私下里秘密聚会。这在当时是学生身份的一个重要标志。这些组织和活动能有效地将来自特里尔地区的学生们团结在一起。他们在波恩附近组织郊游和等活动。</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.btitle=%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E6%B3%A2%E6%81%A9%E7%9A%84%E6%B1%82%E5%AD%A6%E4%B9%8B%E8%B7%AF&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.uni-bonn.de%2Feinrichtungen%2Funiversitaetsverwaltung%2Forganisationsplan%2Farchiv%2Funiversitaetsmuseum%2Fmarxchinesisch&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-18"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-18">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20161003101632/http://max.book118.com/html/2015/0603/18317740.shtm" rel="nofollow">中国大百科全书外国历史（2）.pdf</a>. 2015-06-03 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2016-10-02</span>]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://max.book118.com/html/2015/0603/18317740.shtm" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2016-10-03） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（中国大陆）网页">（中文（中国大陆））</span>. <q>马克思为了发展和壮大民主力量，参加科隆民主协会和科隆工人联合会的工作，同这些组织中的错误倾向……</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.btitle=%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%A4%A7%E7%99%BE%E7%A7%91%E5%85%A8%E4%B9%A6%E5%A4%96%E5%9B%BD%E5%8E%86%E5%8F%B2%EF%BC%882%EF%BC%89.pdf&amp;rft.date=2015-06-03&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fmax.book118.com%2Fhtml%2F2015%2F0603%2F18317740.shtm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-19"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-19">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">卡尔·马克思. <a class="external text" href="https://www.marxists.org/archive/marx/works/1845/german-ideology/ch01b.htm" rel="nofollow">Part I: Feuerbach. Opposition of the Materialist and Idealist Outlook</a>. 《<a href="/wiki/%E5%BE%B7%E6%84%8F%E5%BF%97%E6%84%8F%E8%AD%98%E5%BD%A2%E6%85%8B" title="德意志意识形态">德意志意识形态</a>》. 1845 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2015-05-09</span>]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150102205347/http://www.marxists.org/archive/marx/works/1845/german-ideology/ch01b.htm" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2015-01-02） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>. <q>For each new class which puts itself in the place of one ruling before it, is compelled, merely in order to carry through its aim, to represent its interest as the common interest of all the members of society, that is, expressed in ideal form: it has to give its ideas the form of universality, and represent them as the only rational, universally valid ones.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%8D%A1%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.btitle=Part+I%3A+Feuerbach.+Opposition+of+the+Materialist+and+Idealist+Outlook&amp;rft.date=1845&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E3%80%8A%E5%BE%B7%E6%84%8F%E5%BF%97%E6%84%8F%E8%AD%98%E5%BD%A2%E6%85%8B%E3%80%8B&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marxists.org%2Farchive%2Fmarx%2Fworks%2F1845%2Fgerman-ideology%2Fch01b.htm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-20"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-20">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation news"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210409022313/http://www.cqvip.com/qk/82820a/1998003/3000915044.html" rel="nofollow">马克思主义的国家消亡理论与全球一体化</a>. 《青海民族大学学报：社会科学版》1998年 第3期.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2020-11-22</span>]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://www.cqvip.com/qk/82820a/1998003/3000915044.html" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2021-04-09）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.atitle=%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89%E7%9A%84%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E6%B6%88%E4%BA%A1%E7%90%86%E8%AE%BA%E4%B8%8E%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E4%B8%80%E4%BD%93%E5%8C%96&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.cqvip.com%2Fqk%2F82820a%2F1998003%2F3000915044.html&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-21"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-21">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">卡尔·马克思. <a class="external text" href="https://www.marxists.org/archive/marx/works/1875/gotha/index.htm" rel="nofollow">Critique of the Gotha Programme</a>. 《<a href="/wiki/%E5%93%A5%E8%BE%BE%E7%BA%B2%E9%A2%86%E6%89%B9%E5%88%A4" title="哥达纲领批判">哥达纲领批判</a>》. 1875年 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2015-05-09</span>]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20171020022542/https://www.marxists.org/archive/marx/works/1875/gotha/index.htm" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2017-10-20） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>. <q>Critique of the Gotha Programme is a critique of the draft programme of the United Workers' Party of Germany. In this document Marx address the dictatorship of the proletariat, the period of transition from capitalism to communism, the two phases of communist society, the production and distribution of the social goods, proletarian internationalism, and the party of the working class.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%8D%A1%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.btitle=Critique+of+the+Gotha+Programme&amp;rft.date=1875&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E3%80%8A%E5%93%A5%E9%81%94%E7%B6%B1%E9%A0%98%E6%89%B9%E5%88%A4%E3%80%8B&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marxists.org%2Farchive%2Fmarx%2Fworks%2F1875%2Fgotha%2Findex.htm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-Craig_Calhoun_23-24-24"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Craig_Calhoun_23-24_24-0"><sup><b>22.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Craig_Calhoun_23-24_24-1"><sup><b>22.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Craig_Calhoun_23-24_24-2"><sup><b>22.2</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Craig_Calhoun_23-24_24-3"><sup><b>22.3</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Craig_Calhoun_23-24_24-4"><sup><b>22.4</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Craig Calhoun、Joseph Gerteis、James Moody、Steven Pfaff、Kathryn Schmidt和Indermohan Virk. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=qlmBgDM-shoC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Classical Sociological Theory</a>. 美国霍博肯: <a href="/wiki/%E7%B4%84%E7%BF%B0%E5%A8%81%E7%AB%8B" title="约翰威立">约翰威立</a>(Craig Calhoun). 2002-04-10: 23–24 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2015-05-09</span>]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0631213482" title="Special:网络书源/978-0631213482"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0631213482</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114325/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=qlmBgDM-shoC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021-02-01） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; <li id="cite_note-80"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-80">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Jonathan Sperber" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="乔纳森·斯珀伯"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%96%AC%E7%B4%8D%E6%A3%AE%C2%B7%E6%96%AF%E7%8F%80%E4%BC%AF&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="乔纳森·斯珀伯（页面不存在）">乔纳森·斯珀伯</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jonathan_Sperber" title="en:Jonathan Sperber"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Jonathan Sperber</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/karlmarxnineteen0000sper" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx: A Nineteenth-Century Life</a>. <li id="cite_note-148"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-148">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">P. N. Fedoseyev. Karl Marx-A Biography. <li id="cite_note-151"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-151">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E5%BC%97%E9%87%8C%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%B8%8C%C2%B7%E6%81%A9%E6%A0%BC%E6%96%AF" title="弗里德里希·恩格斯">弗里德里希·恩格斯</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=064sjJmlCVsC&amp;hl=zh-TW" rel="nofollow">《社会主义从空想到科学的发展》（Socialism: Utopian and Scientific）</a>. <li id="cite_note-Forrest_E._Baird-160"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Forrest_E._Baird_160-0"><sup><b>155.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Forrest_E._Baird_160-1"><sup><b>155.1</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Forrest E. <li id="cite_note-弗朗西斯·惠恩_125-173"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-弗朗西斯·惠恩_125_173-0"><sup><b>168.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-弗朗西斯·惠恩_125_173-1"><sup><b>168.1</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E5%BC%97%E6%9C%97%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E6%83%A0%E6%81%A9" title="弗朗西斯·惠恩">弗朗西斯·惠恩</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=r_3c34tQm0cC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx</a>. <li id="cite_note-178"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-178">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">David Félix. <a class="external text" href="http://www.jstor.org/discover/10.2307/4545968?uid=30789&amp;uid=3739216&amp;uid=30787&amp;uid=2&amp;uid=384900201&amp;uid=3&amp;uid=67&amp;uid=62&amp;uid=5909896&amp;sid=21106347161381" rel="nofollow">Heute Deutschland! </li>
<li id="cite_note-179"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-179">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E5%BC%97%E6%9C%97%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E6%83%A0%E6%81%A9" title="弗朗西斯·惠恩">弗朗西斯·惠恩</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=r_3c34tQm0cC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx</a>. title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-all+%22+data-orig-title%3D%22%E5%BD%BC%E5%BE%97%C2%B7%E8%8F%AF%E7%94%9F+%28%E6%AD%B7%E5%8F%B2%E5%AD%B8%E8%80%85%29%22+data-lang-code%3D%22en%22+data-lang-name%3D%22%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%22+data-foreign-title%3D%22Peter+Watson+%28intellectual+historian%29%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-page%22%3E%E5%BD%BC%E5%BE%97%C2%B7%E8%8F%AF%E7%94%9F%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22noprint+ilh-comment%22%3E%EF%BC%88%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-lang%22%3E%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-colon%22%3E%EF%BC%9A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-link%22%3E-%7B%3Cspan+lang%3D%22en%22+dir%3D%22auto%22%3EPeter+Watson+%28intellectual+historian%29%3C%2Fspan%3E%7D-%3C%2Fspan%3E%EF%BC%89%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E&amp;rft.btitle=The+German+Genius%3A+Europe%27s+Third+Renaissance%2C+the+Second+Scientific+Revolution%2C+and+the+Twentieth+Century&amp;rft.date=2010-06-22&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0060760229&amp;rft.pages=%E7%AC%AC250%E9%A0%81&amp;rft.place=%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E7%B4%90%E7%B4%84&amp;rft.pub=%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-all+%22+data-orig-title%3D%22%E5%93%88%E7%8F%80+%28%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE%29%22+data-lang-code%3D%22en%22+data-lang-name%3D%22%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%22+data-foreign-title%3D%22Harper+%28publisher%29%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-page%22%3E%E5%93%88%E7%8F%80%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22noprint+ilh-comment%22%3E%EF%BC%88%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-lang%22%3E%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-colon%22%3E%EF%BC%9A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-link%22%3E-%7B%3Cspan+lang%3D%22en%22+dir%3D%22auto%22%3EHarper+%28publisher%29%3C%2Fspan%3E%7D-%3C%2Fspan%3E%EF%BC%89%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DnvUY0YwuKF0C%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span <li id="cite_note-193"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-193">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Achille Loria" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="阿希尔·洛里亚"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%98%BF%E5%B8%8C%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E6%B4%9B%E9%87%8C%E4%BA%9A&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="阿希尔·洛里亚（页面不存在）">阿希尔·洛里亚</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Achille_Loria" title="en:Achille Loria"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Achille Loria</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/48446/48446-h/48446-h.htm" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20210103022814/http://www.gutenberg.org/files/48446/48446-h/48446-h.htm" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）. 美国安娜堡: <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="University of Michigan Library" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="密西根大学出版社"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%AF%86%E8%A5%BF%E6%A0%B9%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="密西根大学出版社（页面不存在）">密西根大学出版社</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_Michigan_Library" title="en:University of Michigan Library"><span dir="auto" lang="en">University of Michigan Library</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 1920年1月1日: 第73页 <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span>.</span>

<li id="cite_note-弗朗西斯·惠恩_152-200"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-弗朗西斯·惠恩_152_200-0"><sup><b>195.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-弗朗西斯·惠恩_152_200-1"><sup><b>195.1</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E5%BC%97%E6%9C%97%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E6%83%A0%E6%81%A9" title="弗朗西斯·惠恩">弗朗西斯·惠恩</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=r_3c34tQm0cC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx</a>. Fourth Estate Classic House. 2000年2月: 第152页 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1857026375" title="Special:网络书源/978-1857026375"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1857026375</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114402/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=r_3c34tQm0cC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年2月1日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%BC%97%E6%9C%97%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E6%83%A0%E6%81%A9&amp;rft.btitle=Karl+Marx&amp;rft.date=2000-02&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-1857026375&amp;rft.pages=%E7%AC%AC152%E9%A0%81&amp;rft.pub=Fourth+Estate+Classic+House&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3Dr_3c34tQm0cC%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-207"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-207">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">卡尔·马克思. 《<a href="/wiki/%E8%B7%AF%E6%98%93%C2%B7%E6%B3%A2%E6%8B%BF%E5%B7%B4%E7%9A%84%E9%9B%BE%E6%9C%88%E5%8D%81%E5%85%AB%E6%97%A5" title="路易·波拿巴的雾月十八日">路易·波拿巴的雾月十八日</a>》（<a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=ryOVzGSq0zYC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">The 18th Brumaire of Louis Bonaparte</a>）. 美国纽约: <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Wildside Press" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="Wildside Press"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Wildside_Press&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Wildside Press（页面不存在）">Wildside Press</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wildside_Press" title="en:Wildside Press"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Wildside Press</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 2008年3月30日: 第141页. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1434463746" title="Special:网络书源/978-1434463746"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1434463746</a> <span style="font-family: sans-serif; <li id="cite_note-欧洲高等学院-208"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-欧洲高等学院_208-0"><sup><b>203.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-欧洲高等学院_208-1"><sup><b>203.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-欧洲高等学院_208-2"><sup><b>203.2</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-欧洲高等学院_208-3"><sup><b>203.3</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-欧洲高等学院_208-4"><sup><b>203.4</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-欧洲高等学院_208-5"><sup><b>203.5</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-欧洲高等学院_208-6"><sup><b>203.6</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-欧洲高等学院_208-7"><sup><b>203.7</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20100901101839/http://www.egs.edu/library/karl-marx/biography" rel="nofollow">KARL HEINRICH MARX - BIOGRAPHY</a>. <a href="/wiki/%E6%AD%90%E6%B4%B2%E9%AB%98%E7%AD%89%E5%AD%B8%E9%99%A2" title="欧洲高等学院">欧洲高等学院</a>.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://www.egs.edu/library/karl-marx/biography/" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2010年9月1日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.btitle=KARL+HEINRICH+MARX+-+BIOGRAPHY&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E6%AD%90%E6%B4%B2%E9%AB%98%E7%AD%89%E5%AD%B8%E9%99%A2&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.egs.edu%2Flibrary%2Fkarl-marx%2Fbiography%2F&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-209"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-209">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Enrique Dussel" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="恩立克·杜赛尔"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%81%A9%E7%AB%8B%E5%85%8B%C2%B7%E6%9D%9C%E8%B3%BD%E7%88%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="恩立克·杜赛尔（页面不存在）">恩立克·杜赛尔</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Enrique_Dussel" title="en:Enrique Dussel"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Enrique Dussel</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="https://www.worldcat.org/oclc/50704908" rel="nofollow">Towards An Unknown Marx: A Commentary on the Manuscripts of 1861-63</a>. 英国伦敦: <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%BE%85%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%A5%87" title="罗德里奇">罗德里奇</a>. 2001年7月10日: 第33页 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0415215459" title="Special:网络书源/978-0415215459"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0415215459</a>. <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/oclc/50704908" rel="nofollow"><span title="OCLC">OCLC 50704908</span></a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20200608130644/http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/50704908" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2020年6月8日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; <li id="cite_note-210"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-210">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Achille Loria" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="阿希尔·洛里亚"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%98%BF%E5%B8%8C%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E6%B4%9B%E9%87%8C%E4%BA%9A&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="阿希尔·洛里亚（页面不存在）">阿希尔·洛里亚</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Achille_Loria" title="en:Achille Loria"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Achille Loria</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/48446/48446-h/48446-h.htm" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20210103022814/http://www.gutenberg.org/files/48446/48446-h/48446-h.htm" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）. 美国安娜堡: <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="University of Michigan Library" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="密西根大学出版社"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%AF%86%E8%A5%BF%E6%A0%B9%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="密西根大学出版社（页面不存在）">密西根大学出版社</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_Michigan_Library" title="en:University of Michigan Library"><span dir="auto" lang="en">University of Michigan Library</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 1920年1月1日: 第77页至第78页 <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span>.</span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-213"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-213">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">卡尔·马克思. <a class="external text" href="http://libcom.org/files/Marx%20-%20Dispatches%20for%20the%20New%20York%20Tribune.pdf" rel="nofollow">Dispatches for the New York Tribune: Selected Journalism of Karl Marx</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>. 英国西敏: <a href="/wiki/%E4%BC%81%E9%B9%85%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2" title="企鹅出版集团">企鹅出版集团</a>. 2008年2月26日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0141441924" title="Special:网络书源/978-0141441924"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0141441924</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210103022912/http://libcom.org/files/Marx%20-%20Dispatches%20for%20the%20New%20York%20Tribune.pdf" rel="nofollow">存档</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>于2021年1月3日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%8D%A1%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.btitle=Dispatches+for+the+New+York+Tribune%3A+Selected+Journalism+of+Karl+Marx&amp;rft.date=2008-02-26&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0141441924&amp;rft.place=%E8%8B%B1%E5%9C%8B%E8%A5%BF%E6%95%8F&amp;rft.pub=%E4%BC%81%E9%B5%9D%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E9%9B%86%E5%9C%98&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Flibcom.org%2Ffiles%2FMarx%2520-%2520Dispatches%2520for%2520the%2520New%2520York%2520Tribune.pdf&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

</li>
<li id="cite_note-约翰·科宁汉姆·伍德_232-225"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-约翰·科宁汉姆·伍德_232_225-0"><sup><b>220.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-约翰·科宁汉姆·伍德_232_225-1"><sup><b>220.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-约翰·科宁汉姆·伍德_232_225-2"><sup><b>220.2</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="John Cunningham Wood" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="约翰·科宁汉姆·伍德"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%B4%84%E7%BF%B0%C2%B7%E7%A7%91%E5%AF%A7%E6%BC%A2%E5%A7%86%C2%B7%E4%BC%8D%E5%BE%B7&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="约翰·科宁汉姆·伍德（页面不存在）">约翰·科宁汉姆·伍德</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Cunningham_Wood" title="en:John Cunningham Wood"><span dir="auto" lang="en">John Cunningham Wood</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=zoNIh_NYeRwC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx's Economics: Critical Assessments II</a>. 英国伦敦: <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%BE%85%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%A5%87" title="罗德里奇">罗德里奇</a>. 2004年11月11日: 第232页 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0415087117" title="Special:网络书源/978-0415087117"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0415087117</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114658/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=zoNIh_NYeRwC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年2月1日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; <li id="cite_note-229"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-229">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Craig Calhoun、Joseph Gerteis、James Moody、Steven Pfaff、Kathryn Schmidt和Indermohan Virk. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=qlmBgDM-shoC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Classical Sociological Theory</a>. 美国霍博肯: <a href="/wiki/%E7%B4%84%E7%BF%B0%E5%A8%81%E7%AB%8B" title="约翰威立">约翰威立</a>. 2002年4月10日: 第20页 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0631213482" title="Special:网络书源/978-0631213482"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0631213482</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114325/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=qlmBgDM-shoC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年2月1日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=Craig+Calhoun%E3%80%81Joseph+Gerteis%E3%80%81James+Moody%E3%80%81Steven+Pfaff%E3%80%81Kathryn+Schmidt%E5%92%8CIndermohan+Virk&amp;rft.btitle=Classical+Sociological+Theory&amp;rft.date=2002-04-10&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0631213482&amp;rft.pages=%E7%AC%AC20%E9%A0%81&amp;rft.place=%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E9%9C%8D%E5%8D%9A%E8%82%AF&amp;rft.pub=%E7%B4%84%E7%BF%B0%E5%A8%81%E7%AB%8B&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DqlmBgDM-shoC%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-251"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-251">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Joseph Dauben" data-lang-code="de" data-lang-name="德语" data-orig-title="道本周"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%81%93%E6%9C%AC%E5%91%A8&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="道本周（页面不存在）">道本周</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">德语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Dauben" title="de:Joseph Dauben"><span dir="auto" lang="de">Joseph Dauben</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20190130183822/http://www.emis.ams.org/journals/DMJDMV/xvol-icm/19/Dauben.MAN.html" rel="nofollow">Marx, Mao and Mathematics: The Politics of Infinitesimals</a>. <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Documenta Mathematica" data-lang-code="nl" data-lang-name="荷兰语" data-orig-title="数学文献"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%95%B8%E5%AD%B8%E6%96%87%E7%8D%BB&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="数学文献（页面不存在）">数学文献</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">荷兰语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://nl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Documenta_Mathematica" title="nl:Documenta Mathematica"><span dir="auto" lang="nl">Documenta Mathematica</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 2000年1月27日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="http://www.emis.ams.org/journals/DMJDMV/xvol-icm/19/Dauben.MAN.html" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2019年1月30日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; </li>
<li id="cite_note-258"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-258">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E5%BC%97%E6%9C%97%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E6%83%A0%E6%81%A9" title="弗朗西斯·惠恩">弗朗西斯·惠恩</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=r_3c34tQm0cC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx</a>. Fourth Estate Classic House. 2000年2月: 第382页 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1857026375" title="Special:网络书源/978-1857026375"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1857026375</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114402/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=r_3c34tQm0cC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年2月1日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%BC%97%E6%9C%97%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E6%83%A0%E6%81%A9&amp;rft.btitle=Karl+Marx&amp;rft.date=2000-02&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-1857026375&amp;rft.pages=%E7%AC%AC382%E9%A0%81&amp;rft.pub=Fourth+Estate+Classic+House&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3Dr_3c34tQm0cC%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-Howard_J._Sherman_5-263"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Howard_J._Sherman_5_263-0"><sup><b>258.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Howard_J._Sherman_5_263-1"><sup><b>258.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Howard_J._Sherman_5_263-2"><sup><b>258.2</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Howard_J._Sherman_5_263-3"><sup><b>258.3</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Howard_J._Sherman_5_263-4"><sup><b>258.4</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Howard J. Sherman. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=TTZf31HIJKsC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Reinventing Marxism</a>. 美国巴尔的摩: <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%B4%84%E7%BF%B0%E9%9C%8D%E6%99%AE%E9%87%91%E6%96%AF%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="约翰霍普金斯大学出版社">约翰霍普金斯大学出版社</a>. 1995年11月1日: 第5页 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0801850776" title="Special:网络书源/978-0801850776"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0801850776</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114711/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=TTZf31HIJKsC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年2月1日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=Howard+J.+Sherman&amp;rft.btitle=Reinventing+Marxism&amp;rft.date=1995-11-01&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0801850776&amp;rft.pages=%E7%AC%AC5%E9%A0%81&amp;rft.place=%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E5%B7%B4%E7%88%BE%E7%9A%84%E6%91%A9&amp;rft.pub=%E7%B4%84%E7%BF%B0%E9%9C%8D%E6%99%AE%E9%87%91%E6%96%AF%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DTTZf31HIJKsC%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-269"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-269">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">卡尔·马克思. 《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Capital, Volume I" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="资本论·第一卷"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC%E8%AB%96%C2%B7%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E5%8D%B7&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="资本论·第一卷（页面不存在）">资本论·第一卷</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Capital,_Volume_I" title="en:Capital, Volume I"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Capital, Volume I</span></a></span>）</span></span>》. 美国纽约: <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Modern Library" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="现代图书馆"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%8F%BE%E4%BB%A3%E5%9C%96%E6%9B%B8%E9%A4%A8&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="现代图书馆（页面不存在）">现代图书馆</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Modern_Library" title="en:Modern Library"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Modern Library</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 1906年: 第440页 <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span>.</span>

</li>
<li id="cite_note-Craig_Calhoun_22-275"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Craig_Calhoun_22_275-0"><sup><b>270.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Craig_Calhoun_22_275-1"><sup><b>270.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Craig_Calhoun_22_275-2"><sup><b>270.2</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Craig_Calhoun_22_275-3"><sup><b>270.3</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Craig_Calhoun_22_275-4"><sup><b>270.4</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Craig Calhoun、Joseph Gerteis、James Moody、Steven Pfaff、Kathryn Schmidt和Indermohan Virk. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=qlmBgDM-shoC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Classical Sociological Theory</a>. 美国霍博肯: <a href="/wiki/%E7%B4%84%E7%BF%B0%E5%A8%81%E7%AB%8B" title="约翰威立">约翰威立</a>. 2002年4月10日: 第22页 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0631213482" title="Special:网络书源/978-0631213482"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0631213482</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114325/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=qlmBgDM-shoC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年2月1日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; </li>
<li id="cite_note-279"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-279">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Paul Hernadi. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=yNGAg_yK6R4C&amp;pg=PA137&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">The Rhetoric of Interpretation and the Interpretation of Rhetoric</a>. 美国德罕: <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Duke University Press" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="杜克大学出版社"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%9D%9C%E5%85%8B%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="杜克大学出版社（页面不存在）">杜克大学出版社</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Duke_University_Press" title="en:Duke University Press"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Duke University Press</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 1989年6月: 第137页 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0822309345" title="Special:网络书源/978-0822309345"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0822309345</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210103023319/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=yNGAg_yK6R4C&amp;pg=PA137&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年1月3日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=Paul+Hernadi&amp;rft.btitle=The+Rhetoric+of+Interpretation+and+the+Interpretation+of+Rhetoric&amp;rft.date=1989-06&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0822309345&amp;rft.pages=%E7%AC%AC137%E9%A0%81&amp;rft.place=%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E5%BE%B7%E7%BD%95&amp;rft.pub=%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-all+%22+data-orig-title%3D%22%E6%9D%9C%E5%85%8B%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE%22+data-lang-code%3D%22en%22+data-lang-name%3D%22%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%22+data-foreign-title%3D%22Duke+University+Press%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-page%22%3E%E6%9D%9C%E5%85%8B%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22noprint+ilh-comment%22%3E%EF%BC%88%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-lang%22%3E%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-colon%22%3E%EF%BC%9A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-link%22%3E-%7B%3Cspan+lang%3D%22en%22+dir%3D%22auto%22%3EDuke+University+Press%3C%2Fspan%3E%7D-%3C%2Fspan%3E%EF%BC%89%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DyNGAg_yK6R4C%26pg%3DPA137%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-282"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-282">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">卡尔·马克思(Karl Marx，J. O'Malley). <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=uxg4AAAAIAAJ&amp;printsec=frontcover#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">《黑格尔法哲学批判》（Critique of Hegel's 'Philosophy Of Right'）</a>. 英国剑桥: <a href="/wiki/%E5%8A%8D%E6%A9%8B%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="剑桥大学出版社">剑桥大学出版社</a>. 1977年8月26日: 第131页 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0521292115" title="Special:网络书源/978-0521292115"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0521292115</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114828/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=uxg4AAAAIAAJ&amp;printsec=frontcover#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年2月1日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>. <q>This book is a complete translation of Marx's critical commentary on paragraphs 261-313 of Hegel's major work in political theory.</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%8D%A1%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%28Karl+Marx%EF%BC%8CJ.+O%27Malley%29&amp;rft.btitle=%E3%80%8A%E9%BB%91%E6%A0%BC%E7%88%BE%E6%B3%95%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%B8%E6%89%B9%E5%88%A4%E3%80%8B%EF%BC%88Critique+of+Hegel%27s+%27Philosophy+Of+Right%27%EF%BC%89&amp;rft.date=1977-08-26&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0521292115&amp;rft.pages=%E7%AC%AC131%E9%A0%81&amp;rft.place=%E8%8B%B1%E5%9C%8B%E5%8A%8D%E6%A9%8B&amp;rft.pub=%E5%8A%8D%E6%A9%8B%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3Duxg4AAAAIAAJ%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-乔纳森·H·特纳_17-18-284"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-乔纳森·H·特纳_17-18_284-0"><sup><b>279.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-乔纳森·H·特纳_17-18_284-1"><sup><b>279.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-乔纳森·H·特纳_17-18_284-2"><sup><b>279.2</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-乔纳森·H·特纳_17-18_284-3"><sup><b>279.3</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-乔纳森·H·特纳_17-18_284-4"><sup><b>279.4</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Jonathan H. Turner" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="乔纳森·H·特纳"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%96%AC%E7%B4%8D%E6%A3%AE%C2%B7H%C2%B7%E7%89%B9%E7%B4%8D&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="乔纳森·H·特纳（页面不存在）">乔纳森·H·特纳</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jonathan_H._Turner" title="en:Jonathan H. Turner"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Jonathan H. Turner</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="https://www.worldcat.org/oclc/60669025" rel="nofollow">Sociology</a>. 美国博根郡: <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%9F%B9%E7%94%9F%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8" title="培生教育出版公司">培生教育出版公司</a>. 2005年9月2日: 第17页至第18页 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0131134966" title="Special:网络书源/978-0131134966"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0131134966</a>. <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/oclc/60669025" rel="nofollow"><span title="OCLC">OCLC 60669025</span></a> <span style="font-family: sans-serif; <li id="cite_note-285"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-285">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Dennis Gilbert" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="丹尼斯·盖伯特"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E4%B8%B9%E5%B0%BC%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E8%93%8B%E4%BC%AF%E7%89%B9&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="丹尼斯·盖伯特（页面不存在）">丹尼斯·盖伯特</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dennis_Gilbert" title="en:Dennis Gilbert"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Dennis Gilbert</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=hPlf4paJw3oC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">The American Class Structure in an Age of Growing Inequality</a>. 美国千橡: <a href="/wiki/%E8%B3%BD%E5%90%89%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8" title="赛吉出版公司">赛吉出版公司</a>. 2010年5月13日: 第6页 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1412979658" title="Special:网络书源/978-1412979658"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1412979658</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114853/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=hPlf4paJw3oC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年2月1日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; <li id="cite_note-286"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-286">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Achille Loria" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="阿希尔·洛里亚"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%98%BF%E5%B8%8C%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E6%B4%9B%E9%87%8C%E4%BA%9A&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="阿希尔·洛里亚（页面不存在）">阿希尔·洛里亚</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Achille_Loria" title="en:Achille Loria"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Achille Loria</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/48446/48446-h/48446-h.htm" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20210103022814/http://www.gutenberg.org/files/48446/48446-h/48446-h.htm" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）. 美国安娜堡: <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="University of Michigan Library" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="密西根大学出版社"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%AF%86%E8%A5%BF%E6%A0%B9%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="密西根大学出版社（页面不存在）">密西根大学出版社</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_Michigan_Library" title="en:University of Michigan Library"><span dir="auto" lang="en">University of Michigan Library</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 1920年1月1日: 第57页 <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span>.</span>

<li id="cite_note-291"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-291">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E5%BC%97%E6%9C%97%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E6%83%A0%E6%81%A9" title="弗朗西斯·惠恩">弗朗西斯·惠恩</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=r_3c34tQm0cC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx</a>. <li id="cite_note-299"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-299">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Craig Calhoun、Joseph Gerteis、James Moody、Steven Pfaff、Kathryn Schmidt和Indermohan Virk. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=qlmBgDM-shoC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Classical Sociological Theory</a>. 美国霍博肯: <a href="/wiki/%E7%B4%84%E7%BF%B0%E5%A8%81%E7%AB%8B" title="约翰威立">约翰威立</a>. 2002年4月10日: 第19页 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0631213482" title="Special:网络书源/978-0631213482"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0631213482</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114325/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=qlmBgDM-shoC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年2月1日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=Craig+Calhoun%E3%80%81Joseph+Gerteis%E3%80%81James+Moody%E3%80%81Steven+Pfaff%E3%80%81Kathryn+Schmidt%E5%92%8CIndermohan+Virk&amp;rft.btitle=Classical+Sociological+Theory&amp;rft.date=2002-04-10&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0631213482&amp;rft.pages=%E7%AC%AC19%E9%A0%81&amp;rft.place=%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E9%9C%8D%E5%8D%9A%E8%82%AF&amp;rft.pub=%E7%B4%84%E7%BF%B0%E5%A8%81%E7%AB%8B&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DqlmBgDM-shoC%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-304"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-304">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E8%B7%AF%E5%BE%B7%E7%B6%AD%E5%B8%8C%C2%B7%E9%A6%AE%C2%B7%E7%B1%B3%E5%A1%9E%E6%96%AF" title="路德维希·冯·米塞斯">路德维希·冯·米塞斯</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://mises.org/sites/default/files/Planned%20Chaos_3.pdf" rel="nofollow">Planned Chaos</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>. 美国欧本: <a href="/wiki/%E8%B7%AF%E5%BE%B7%E7%B6%AD%E5%B8%8C%C2%B7%E9%A6%AE%C2%B7%E7%B1%B3%E5%A1%9E%E6%96%AF%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E6%89%80" title="路德维希·冯·米塞斯研究所">路德维希·冯·米塞斯研究所</a>. 2014年9月29日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1933550602" title="Special:网络书源/978-1933550602"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1933550602</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160307103252/https://mises.org/sites/default/files/Planned%20Chaos_3.pdf" rel="nofollow">存档</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>于2016年3月7日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E8%B7%AF%E5%BE%B7%E7%B6%AD%E5%B8%8C%C2%B7%E9%A6%AE%C2%B7%E7%B1%B3%E5%A1%9E%E6%96%AF&amp;rft.btitle=Planned+Chaos&amp;rft.date=2014-09-29&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-1933550602&amp;rft.place=%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E6%AD%90%E6%9C%AC&amp;rft.pub=%E8%B7%AF%E5%BE%B7%E7%B6%AD%E5%B8%8C%C2%B7%E9%A6%AE%C2%B7%E7%B1%B3%E5%A1%9E%E6%96%AF%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E6%89%80&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fmises.org%2Fsites%2Fdefault%2Ffiles%2FPlanned%2520Chaos_3.pdf&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-305"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-305">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E8%B7%AF%E5%BE%B7%E7%B6%AD%E5%B8%8C%C2%B7%E9%A6%AE%C2%B7%E7%B1%B3%E5%A1%9E%E6%96%AF" title="路德维希·冯·米塞斯">路德维希·冯·米塞斯</a>. <a class="external text" href="http://fee.org/files/doclib/20130703_MarxismUnmasked.pdf" rel="nofollow">Marxism Unmasked: From Delusion to Destruction</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>. 美国亚特兰大: <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Foundation for Economic Education" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="经济教育基金会"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%B6%93%E6%BF%9F%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E5%9F%BA%E9%87%91%E6%9C%83&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="经济教育基金会（页面不存在）">经济教育基金会</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Foundation_for_Economic_Education" title="en:Foundation for Economic Education"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Foundation for Economic Education</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 2006年 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1572462106" title="Special:网络书源/978-1572462106"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1572462106</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20200214174507/https://www.fee.org/files/doclib/20130703_MarxismUnmasked.pdf" rel="nofollow">存档</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>于2020年2月14日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E8%B7%AF%E5%BE%B7%E7%B6%AD%E5%B8%8C%C2%B7%E9%A6%AE%C2%B7%E7%B1%B3%E5%A1%9E%E6%96%AF&amp;rft.btitle=Marxism+Unmasked%3A+From+Delusion+to+Destruction&amp;rft.date=2006&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-1572462106&amp;rft.place=%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E4%BA%9E%E7%89%B9%E8%98%AD%E5%A4%A7&amp;rft.pub=%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-all+%22+data-orig-title%3D%22%E7%B6%93%E6%BF%9F%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E5%9F%BA%E9%87%91%E6%9C%83%22+data-lang-code%3D%22en%22+data-lang-name%3D%22%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%22+data-foreign-title%3D%22Foundation+for+Economic+Education%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-page%22%3E%E7%B6%93%E6%BF%9F%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E5%9F%BA%E9%87%91%E6%9C%83%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22noprint+ilh-comment%22%3E%EF%BC%88%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-lang%22%3E%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-colon%22%3E%EF%BC%9A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-link%22%3E-%7B%3Cspan+lang%3D%22en%22+dir%3D%22auto%22%3EFoundation+for+Economic+Education%3C%2Fspan%3E%7D-%3C%2Fspan%3E%EF%BC%89%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Ffee.org%2Ffiles%2Fdoclib%2F20130703_MarxismUnmasked.pdf&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-Heine_Anderson_123-306"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Heine_Anderson_123_306-0"><sup><b>301.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Heine_Anderson_123_306-1"><sup><b>301.1</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Heine_Anderson_123_306-2"><sup><b>301.2</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Heine Anderson和Lars Bo Kaspersen. <a class="external text" href="https://www.worldcat.org/oclc/42921334" rel="nofollow">Classical and Modern Social Theory</a>. 美国霍博肯: <a href="/wiki/%E7%B4%84%E7%BF%B0%E5%A8%81%E7%AB%8B" title="约翰威立">约翰威立</a>. 2000年9月13日: 第123页 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0631212881" title="Special:网络书源/978-0631212881"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0631212881</a>. <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/oclc/42921334" rel="nofollow"><span title="OCLC">OCLC 42921334</span></a> <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=Heine+Anderson%E5%92%8CLars+Bo+Kaspersen&amp;rft.btitle=Classical+and+Modern+Social+Theory&amp;rft.date=2000-09-13&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0631212881&amp;rft.pages=%E7%AC%AC123%E9%A0%81&amp;rft.place=%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E9%9C%8D%E5%8D%9A%E8%82%AF&amp;rft.pub=%E7%B4%84%E7%BF%B0%E5%A8%81%E7%AB%8B&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.worldcat.org%2Foclc%2F42921334&amp;rft_id=info%3Aoclcnum%2F42921334&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-307"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-307">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">今村仁司、三岛宪一、鹫田清一和野家启一. <a class="external text" href="https://www.worldcat.org/oclc/298591409" rel="nofollow">《马克思、尼采、弗洛伊德、胡塞尔：现代思想的源流》</a>. 中国石家庄: <a href="/wiki/%E6%B2%B3%E5%8C%97%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="河北教育出版社">河北教育出版社</a>. 2001年8月 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/7-5434-4544-1" title="Special:网络书源/7-5434-4544-1"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 7-5434-4544-1</a> <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（中国大陆）网页">（中文（中国大陆））</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E4%BB%8A%E6%9D%91%E4%BB%81%E5%8F%B8%E3%80%81%E4%B8%89%E5%B3%B6%E6%86%B2%E4%B8%80%E3%80%81%E9%B7%B2%E7%94%B0%E6%B8%85%E4%B8%80%E5%92%8C%E9%87%8E%E5%AE%B6%E5%95%9F%E4%B8%80&amp;rft.btitle=%E3%80%8A%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E3%80%81%E5%B0%BC%E9%87%87%E3%80%81%E5%BC%97%E6%B4%9B%E4%BC%8A%E5%BE%B7%E3%80%81%E8%83%A1%E5%A1%9E%E5%B0%94%EF%BC%9A%E7%8E%B0%E4%BB%A3%E6%80%9D%E6%83%B3%E7%9A%84%E6%BA%90%E6%B5%81%E3%80%8B&amp;rft.date=2001-08&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=7-5434-4544-1&amp;rft.place=%E4%B8%AD%E5%9C%8B%E7%9F%B3%E5%AE%B6%E8%8E%8A&amp;rft.pub=%E6%B2%B3%E5%8C%97%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.worldcat.org%2Foclc%2F298591409&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-308"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-308">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Rüdiger Safranski" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="吕迪格·萨弗兰斯基"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%91%82%E8%BF%AA%E6%A0%BC%C2%B7%E8%96%A9%E5%BC%97%E8%98%AD%E6%96%AF%E5%9F%BA&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="吕迪格·萨弗兰斯基（页面不存在）">吕迪格·萨弗兰斯基</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R%C3%BCdiger_Safranski" title="en:Rüdiger Safranski"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Rüdiger Safranski</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=DX47SpX5cnMC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Martin Heidegger: Between Good and Evil</a>. 美国剑桥: <a href="/wiki/%E5%93%88%E4%BD%9B%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="哈佛大学出版社">哈佛大学出版社</a>. 1999年11月1日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0674387102" title="Special:网络书源/978-0674387102"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0674387102</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210103023422/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=DX47SpX5cnMC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年1月3日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-all+%22+data-orig-title%3D%22%E5%91%82%E8%BF%AA%E6%A0%BC%C2%B7%E8%96%A9%E5%BC%97%E8%98%AD%E6%96%AF%E5%9F%BA%22+data-lang-code%3D%22en%22+data-lang-name%3D%22%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%22+data-foreign-title%3D%22R%C3%BCdiger+Safranski%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-page%22%3E%E5%91%82%E8%BF%AA%E6%A0%BC%C2%B7%E8%96%A9%E5%BC%97%E8%98%AD%E6%96%AF%E5%9F%BA%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22noprint+ilh-comment%22%3E%EF%BC%88%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-lang%22%3E%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-colon%22%3E%EF%BC%9A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-link%22%3E-%7B%3Cspan+lang%3D%22en%22+dir%3D%22auto%22%3ER%C3%BCdiger+Safranski%3C%2Fspan%3E%7D-%3C%2Fspan%3E%EF%BC%89%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E&amp;rft.btitle=Martin+Heidegger%3A+Between+Good+and+Evil&amp;rft.date=1999-11-01&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0674387102&amp;rft.place=%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E5%8A%8D%E6%A9%8B&amp;rft.pub=%E5%93%88%E4%BD%9B%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DDX47SpX5cnMC%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-周穗明-309"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-周穗明_309-0"><sup><b>304.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-周穗明_309-1"><sup><b>304.1</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">周穗明. <a class="external text" href="http://news.xinhuanet.com/theory/2011-04/11/c_121289059.htm" rel="nofollow">在“西方马克思主义”旗下对资本主义社会的全面批判</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%96%B0%E8%8F%AF%E7%B6%B2" title="新华网">新华网</a>. 2011年4月11日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [<span class="nowrap">2015-05-09</span>]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20130129041054/http://news.xinhuanet.com/theory/2011-04/11/c_121289059.htm" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2013-01-29） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（简体）网页">（中文（简体））</span>. <q>法兰克福学派是20世纪西方新马克思主义中最大的流派，也是至今仍保持强大文化影响力的西方主要学术流派之一。法兰克福学派在当代西方思想史上享有重要地位。在大半个世纪的发展过程中，法兰克福学派从开始运用马克思批判资本主义的现成结论去度量现代资本主义，到把马克思主义与各种现代西方社会思潮相结合，再到最终形成一套独立的社会批判规范和方法，在“西方马克思主义”的旗下对现代资本主义社会进行了全面的批判。尽管社会批判理论有其局限性，但是它在当代哲学、社会学、传播学和文化研究的各个领域中受到广泛的重视和应用，至今仍然是西方新马克思主义中“生存得最好的”流派（安德森语）。</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%91%A8%E7%A9%97%E6%98%8E&amp;rft.btitle=%E5%9C%A8%E2%80%9C%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%B9%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89%E2%80%9D%E6%97%97%E4%B8%8B%E5%AF%B9%E8%B5%84%E6%9C%AC%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89%E7%A4%BE%E4%BC%9A%E7%9A%84%E5%85%A8%E9%9D%A2%E6%89%B9%E5%88%A4&amp;rft.date=2011-04-11&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E6%96%B0%E8%8F%AF%E7%B6%B2&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fnews.xinhuanet.com%2Ftheory%2F2011-04%2F11%2Fc_121289059.htm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-310"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-310">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E8%8E%B1%E8%B0%A2%E5%85%8B%C2%B7%E7%A7%91%E6%8B%89%E7%A7%91%E5%A4%AB%E6%96%AF%E5%9F%BA" title="莱谢克·科拉科夫斯基">莱谢克·科拉科夫斯基</a>. 《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Main Currents of Marxism" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="马克思主义的主流流派"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E4%B8%BB%E7%BE%A9%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%BB%E6%B5%81%E6%B5%81%E6%B4%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="马克思主义的主流流派（页面不存在）">马克思主义的主流流派</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Currents_of_Marxism" title="en:Main Currents of Marxism"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Main Currents of Marxism</span></a></span>）</span></span>》. 美国纽约: <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="W. W. Norton &amp; Company" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="诺顿出版公司"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%AB%BE%E9%A0%93%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="诺顿出版公司（页面不存在）">诺顿出版公司</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/W._W._Norton_%26_Company" title="en:W. W. Norton &amp; Company"><span dir="auto" lang="en">W. W. Norton &amp; Company</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 2008年1月17日. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0393329438" title="Special:网络书源/978-0393329438"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0393329438</a> <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988"
