<li id="cite_note-317"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-317">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a href="/wiki/%E8%90%A8%E5%B0%94%E7%93%A6%E5%A4%9A%C2%B7%E9%98%BF%E8%BF%9E%E5%BE%B7" title="萨尔瓦多·阿连德">萨尔瓦多·阿叶德</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://www.marxists.org/archive/allende/1970/september/20.htm" rel="nofollow">First speech to the Chilean parliament after his election</a>. <a href="/wiki/%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89%E6%96%87%E5%BA%93" title="马克思主义文库">马克思主义文库</a>.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20140924044153/http://marxists.org/archive/allende/1970/september/20.htm" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2014年9月24日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E8%96%A9%E7%88%BE%E7%93%A6%E5%A4%9A%C2%B7%E9%98%BF%E8%91%89%E5%BE%B7&amp;rft.btitle=First+speech+to+the+Chilean+parliament+after+his+election&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E4%B8%BB%E7%BE%A9%E6%96%87%E5%BA%AB&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marxists.org%2Farchive%2Fallende%2F1970%2Fseptember%2F20.htm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-323"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-323">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Ingo Elbe" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="伊果·艾贝"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E4%BC%8A%E6%9E%9C%C2%B7%E8%89%BE%E8%B2%9D&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="伊果·艾贝（页面不存在）">伊果·艾贝</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ingo_Elbe" title="en:Ingo Elbe"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Ingo Elbe</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150108194200/https://viewpointmag.com/2013/10/21/between-marx-marxism-and-marxisms-ways-of-reading-marxs-theory/" rel="nofollow">Between Marx, Marxism, and Marxisms – Ways of Reading Marx’s Theory</a>. Viewpoint Magazine. 2013年10月21日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. （<a class="external text" href="https://viewpointmag.com/2013/10/21/between-marx-marxism-and-marxisms-ways-of-reading-marxs-theory/" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2015年1月8日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-all+%22+data-orig-title%3D%22%E4%BC%8A%E6%9E%9C%C2%B7%E8%89%BE%E8%B2%9D%22+data-lang-code%3D%22en%22+data-lang-name%3D%22%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%22+data-foreign-title%3D%22Ingo+Elbe%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-page%22%3E%E4%BC%8A%E6%9E%9C%C2%B7%E8%89%BE%E8%B2%9D%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22noprint+ilh-comment%22%3E%EF%BC%88%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-lang%22%3E%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-colon%22%3E%EF%BC%9A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-link%22%3E-%7B%3Cspan+lang%3D%22en%22+dir%3D%22auto%22%3EIngo+Elbe%3C%2Fspan%3E%7D-%3C%2Fspan%3E%EF%BC%89%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E&amp;rft.btitle=Between+Marx%2C+Marxism%2C+and+Marxisms+%E2%80%93+Ways+of+Reading+Marx%E2%80%99s+Theory&amp;rft.date=2013-10-21&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=Viewpoint+Magazine&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fviewpointmag.com%2F2013%2F10%2F21%2Fbetween-marx-marxism-and-marxisms-ways-of-reading-marxs-theory%2F&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-广州日报-324"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-广州日报_324-0"><sup><b>319.0</b></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-广州日报_324-1"><sup><b>319.1</b></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">《<a href="/wiki/%E5%B9%BF%E5%B7%9E%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5" title="广州日报">广州日报</a>》. <a class="external text" href="http://news.xinhuanet.com/world/2008-10/17/content_10206873.htm" rel="nofollow">金融危机“捧热”《资本论》</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%96%B0%E8%8F%AF%E7%B6%B2" title="新华网">新华网</a>. 2008年10月17日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20130114220554/http://news.xinhuanet.com/world/2008-10/17/content_10206873.htm" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2013年1月14日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（简体）网页">（中文（简体））</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E3%80%8A%E5%BB%A3%E5%B7%9E%E6%97%A5%E5%A0%B1%E3%80%8B&amp;rft.btitle=%E9%87%91%E8%9E%8D%E5%8D%B1%E6%9C%BA%E2%80%9C%E6%8D%A7%E7%83%AD%E2%80%9D%E3%80%8A%E8%B5%84%E6%9C%AC%E8%AE%BA%E3%80%8B&amp;rft.date=2008-10-17&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E6%96%B0%E8%8F%AF%E7%B6%B2&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fnews.xinhuanet.com%2Fworld%2F2008-10%2F17%2Fcontent_10206873.htm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-325"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-325">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">张兴慧. <a class="external text" href="http://news.xinhuanet.com/world/2009-05/05/content_11313495.htm" rel="nofollow">假如马克思还活着……</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%96%B0%E8%8F%AF%E7%B6%B2" title="新华网">新华网</a>. 2009年5月5日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20141124160318/http://news.xinhuanet.com/world/2009-05/05/content_11313495.htm" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2014年11月24日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（简体）网页">（中文（简体））</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%BC%A0%E5%85%B4%E6%85%A7&amp;rft.btitle=%E5%81%87%E5%A6%82%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E8%BF%98%E6%B4%BB%E7%9D%80%E2%80%A6%E2%80%A6&amp;rft.date=2009-05-05&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E6%96%B0%E8%8F%AF%E7%B6%B2&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fnews.xinhuanet.com%2Fworld%2F2009-05%2F05%2Fcontent_11313495.htm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-326"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-326">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E6%B3%B0%E7%91%9E%C2%B7%E4%BC%8A%E6%A0%BC%E9%A0%93" title="泰瑞·伊格顿">泰瑞·伊格顿</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://book.douban.com/subject/6529665/" rel="nofollow">《马克思为什么是对的》（[Why Marx Was Right]）</a>. 中国北京: <a href="/wiki/%E6%96%B0%E6%98%9F%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="新星出版社">新星出版社</a>. 2011年7月1日: 全册 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-7513303125" title="Special:网络书源/978-7513303125"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-7513303125</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201115157/https://book.douban.com/subject/6529665/" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年2月1日） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（中国大陆）网页">（中文（中国大陆））</span>. <q>《马克思为什么是对的》讲述了：在全球化的背景下，资本主义内部的各种痼疾纷纷显露。从城乡差距、贫富不均到经济掠夺问题，加上全球霸权在金融海啸中显露的腐败，种种迹象显示，让整个世界重新认识、反思马克思主义的契机正在显现。作为一位坚定的马克思主义者，作者特里·伊格尔顿希望厘清人们对马克思主义的错误认识</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E6%B3%B0%E7%91%9E%C2%B7%E4%BC%8A%E6%A0%BC%E9%A0%93&amp;rft.btitle=%E3%80%8A%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E4%B8%BA%E4%BB%80%E4%B9%88%E6%98%AF%E5%AF%B9%E7%9A%84%E3%80%8B%EF%BC%88%5BWhy+Marx+Was+Right%5D%EF%BC%89&amp;rft.date=2011-07-01&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-7513303125&amp;rft.pages=%E5%85%A8%E5%86%8C&amp;rft.place=%E4%B8%AD%E5%9C%8B%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC&amp;rft.pub=%E6%96%B0%E6%98%9F%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbook.douban.com%2Fsubject%2F6529665%2F&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-327"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-327">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E9%9B%85%E5%85%8B%C2%B7%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E8%BE%BE" title="雅克·德里达">雅克·德希达</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/makesideyouling0000unse" rel="nofollow">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Specters of Marx" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="马克思的幽灵"><span class="ilh-page">[[:马克思的幽灵|马克思的幽灵]]</span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Specters of Marx</span>]]</span>）</span></span>》</a>. 何一 译. 中国北京: <a href="/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E5%9C%8B%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="中国人民大学出版社">中国人民大学出版社</a>. 2008年4月1日 <span class="reference-accessdate"> [2015年5月9日]</span>. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-7300091822" title="Special:网络书源/978-7300091822"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-7300091822</a>. <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/oclc/430327347" rel="nofollow"><span title="OCLC">OCLC 430327347</span></a> <span style="font-family: sans-serif; <h3><span id=".E6.9D.A5.E6.BA.90"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="来源">来源</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;action=edit&amp;section=32" title="编辑章节：来源">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r61209943">.mw-parser-output .refbegin{font-size:90%;margin-bottom:0.5em}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul{list-style-type:none;margin-left:0}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul>li,.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>dl>dd{margin-left:0;padding-left:3.2em;text-indent:-3.2em;list-style:none}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-100{font-size:100%}</style><div class="refbegin columns references-column-width" style="-moz-column-width: 35em; -webkit-column-width: 35em; column-width: 35em;">
<ul><li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E5%BD%BC%E5%BE%97%C2%B7%E8%BE%9B%E6%A0%BC" title="彼得·辛格">彼得·辛格</a>. Marx. 英国牛津: <a href="/wiki/%E7%89%9B%E6%B4%A5%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="牛津大学出版社">牛津大学出版社</a>. 1983年11月24日. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0192875105" title="Special:网络书源/978-0192875105"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0192875105</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%BD%BC%E5%BE%97%C2%B7%E8%BE%9B%E6%A0%BC&amp;rft.btitle=Marx&amp;rft.date=1983-11-24&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0192875105&amp;rft.place=%E8%8B%B1%E5%9C%8B%E7%89%9B%E6%B4%A5&amp;rft.pub=%E7%89%9B%E6%B4%A5%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E9%AE%91%E9%87%8C%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E5%B0%BC%E5%8F%A4%E6%8B%89%E5%A4%AB%E6%96%AF%E5%9F%BA" title="鲍里斯·尼古拉夫斯基">鲍里斯·尼古拉夫斯基</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/karlmarxmanandfi029120mbp" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx - Man And Fighter</a>. Caven Press. 2007年3月15日. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1406727036" title="Special:网络书源/978-1406727036"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1406727036</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E9%AE%91%E9%87%8C%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E5%B0%BC%E5%8F%A4%E6%8B%89%E5%A4%AB%E6%96%AF%E5%9F%BA&amp;rft.btitle=Karl+Marx+-+Man+And+Fighter&amp;rft.date=2007-03-15&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-1406727036&amp;rft.pub=Caven+Press&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Farchive.org%2Fdetails%2Fkarlmarxmanandfi029120mbp&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E5%BC%97%E6%9C%97%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E6%83%A0%E6%81%A9" title="弗朗西斯·惠恩">弗朗西斯·惠恩</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=r_3c34tQm0cC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx</a>. Fourth Estate Classic House. 2000年2月. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1857026375" title="Special:网络书源/978-1857026375"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1857026375</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210201114402/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=r_3c34tQm0cC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021-02-01）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E5%BC%97%E6%9C%97%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E6%83%A0%E6%81%A9&amp;rft.btitle=Karl+Marx&amp;rft.date=2000-02&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-1857026375&amp;rft.pub=Fourth+Estate+Classic+House&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3Dr_3c34tQm0cC%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E6%88%B4%E7%B6%AD%C2%B7%E9%BA%A5%E5%85%8B%E8%90%8A%E5%80%AB_(%E6%94%BF%E6%B2%BB%E5%AD%B8%E5%AE%B6)" title="戴维·麦克莱伦 (政治学家)">戴维·麦克莱伦</a>. Red Prussian: Life and Legend of Karl Marx. <li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%88%97%E5%AF%A7" title="列宁">列宁</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://www.marxists.org/archive/lenin/works/1914/granat/index.htm" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx A Brief Biographical Sketch With an Exposition of Marxism</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20210201115208/https://www.marxists.org/archive/lenin/works/1914/granat/index.htm" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）. 俄罗斯莫斯科: <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Progress Publishers" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="进步出版社"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%80%B2%E6%AD%A5%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="进步出版社（页面不存在）">进步出版社</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Progress_Publishers" title="en:Progress Publishers"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Progress Publishers</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 1914年.</li>

<h2><span id=".E5.BB.B6.E4.BC.B8.E9.96.B1.E8.AE.80"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="延伸阅读">延伸阅读</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;action=edit&amp;section=33" title="编辑章节：延伸阅读">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span id=".E4.BA.BA.E7.89.A9.E5.82.B3.E8.A8.98"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="人物传记">人物传记</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;action=edit&amp;section=34" title="编辑章节：人物传记">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r61209943" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="refbegin columns references-column-width" style="-moz-column-width: 35em; -webkit-column-width: 35em; column-width: 35em;">

<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book"><a href="/wiki/%E6%88%B4%E7%B6%AD%C2%B7%E9%BA%A5%E5%85%8B%E8%90%8A%E5%80%AB_(%E6%94%BF%E6%B2%BB%E5%AD%B8%E5%AE%B6)" title="戴维·麦克莱伦 (政治学家)">戴维·麦克莱伦</a>. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160929014305/https://zh.scribd.com/doc/165401603/David-McLellan-Marx-Before-Marxism-Bookos-org" rel="nofollow">Marx-Before-Marxism-Bookos</a>. 英国贝辛斯托克: <a href="/wiki/%E5%B8%95%E7%88%BE%E6%A0%BC%E9%9B%B7%E5%A4%AB%C2%B7%E9%BA%A5%E7%B1%B3%E5%80%AB" title="帕尔格雷夫·麦米伦">帕尔格雷夫·麦米伦</a>. 1980年4月. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0333278826" title="Special:网络书源/978-0333278826"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0333278826</a>. （<a class="external text" href="https://zh.scribd.com/doc/165401603/David-McLellan-Marx-Before-Marxism-Bookos-org" rel="nofollow">原始内容</a>存档于2016-09-29） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E6%88%B4%E7%B6%AD%C2%B7%E9%BA%A5%E5%85%8B%E8%90%8A%E5%80%AB&amp;rft.btitle=Marx-Before-Marxism-Bookos&amp;rft.date=1980-04&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0333278826&amp;rft.place=%E8%8B%B1%E5%9C%8B%E8%B2%9D%E8%BE%9B%E6%96%AF%E6%89%98%E5%85%8B&amp;rft.pub=%E5%B8%95%E7%88%BE%E6%A0%BC%E9%9B%B7%E5%A4%AB%C2%B7%E9%BA%A5%E7%B1%B3%E5%80%AB&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fzh.scribd.com%2Fdoc%2F165401603%2FDavid-McLellan-Marx-Before-Marxism-Bookos-org&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book"><a Marx. 英国伦敦: <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%BE%85%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%A5%87" title="罗德里奇">罗德里奇</a>. 2009年3月13日. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0415435925" title="Special:网络书源/978-0415435925"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0415435925</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-all+%22+data-orig-title%3D%22%E6%96%87%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E5%B7%B4%E5%A5%88%E7%89%B9%22+data-lang-code%3D%22en%22+data-lang-name%3D%22%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%22+data-foreign-title%3D%22Vince+Barnett%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-page%22%3E%E6%96%87%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E5%B7%B4%E5%A5%88%E7%89%B9%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22noprint+ilh-comment%22%3E%EF%BC%88%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-lang%22%3E%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-colon%22%3E%EF%BC%9A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-link%22%3E-%7B%3Cspan+lang%3D%22en%22+dir%3D%22auto%22%3EVince+Barnett%3C%2Fspan%3E%7D-%3C%2Fspan%3E%EF%BC%89%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E&amp;rft.btitle=Marx&amp;rft.date=2009-03-13&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0415435925&amp;rft.place=%E8%8B%B1%E5%9C%8B%E5%80%AB%E6%95%A6&amp;rft.pub=%E7%BE%85%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%A5%87&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span> <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Achille Loria" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="阿希尔·洛里亚"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%98%BF%E5%B8%8C%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E6%B4%9B%E9%87%8C%E4%BA%9A&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="阿希尔·洛里亚（页面不存在）">阿希尔·洛里亚</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Achille_Loria" title="en:Achille Loria"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Achille Loria</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a class="external text" href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/48446/48446-h/48446-h.htm" rel="nofollow">Karl Marx</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20210103022814/http://www.gutenberg.org/files/48446/48446-h/48446-h.htm" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）. 美国安娜堡: <span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="University of Michigan Library" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="密西根大学出版社"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%AF%86%E8%A5%BF%E6%A0%B9%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="密西根大学出版社（页面不存在）">密西根大学出版社</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_Michigan_Library" title="en:University of Michigan Library"><span dir="auto" lang="en">University of Michigan Library</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 1920年1月1日 <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span>.</li></ul>

<h3><span id=".E4.BA.BA.E7.89.A9.E8.A9.95.E8.AB.96"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="人物评论">人物评论</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;action=edit&amp;section=35" title="编辑章节：人物评论">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r61209943" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="refbegin columns references-column-width" style="-moz-column-width: 35em; -webkit-column-width: 35em; column-width: 35em;">

<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%B7%AF%E6%98%93%C2%B7%E7%9A%AE%E5%9F%83%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E9%98%BF%E7%88%BE%E9%83%BD%E5%A1%9E" title="路易·皮埃尔·阿尔都塞">路易·皮埃尔·阿尔都塞</a>和<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Étienne Balibar" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="艾蒂安·巴里巴"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/%C3%89tienne_Balibar" title="en:Étienne Balibar"><span dir="auto" data-foreign-title="Reading Capital" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="阅读资本论"><span class="ilh-page">[[:阅读资本论|阅读资本论]]</span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Reading Capital</span>]]</span>）</span></span>》（[https://www.marxists.org/reference/archive/althusser/1968/reading-capital/ Reading Capital]）</a>. 英国伦敦: Verso Books. 2009年6月9日. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1844673476" title="Special:网络书源/978-1844673476"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-1844673476</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=%E8%B7%AF%E6%98%93%C2%B7%E7%9A%AE%E5%9F%83%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E9%98%BF%E7%88%BE%E9%83%BD%E5%A1%9E%E5%92%8C%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-all+%22+data-orig-title%3D%22%E8%89%BE%E8%92%82%E5%AE%89%C2%B7%E5%B7%B4%E9%87%8C%E5%B7%B4%22+data-lang-code%3D%22en%22+data-lang-name%3D%22%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%22+data-foreign-title%3D%22%C3%89tienne+Balibar%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-page%22%3E%E8%89%BE%E8%92%82%E5%AE%89%C2%B7%E5%B7%B4%E9%87%8C%E5%B7%B4%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22noprint+ilh-comment%22%3E%EF%BC%88%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-lang%22%3E%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-colon%22%3E%EF%BC%9A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-link%22%3E-%7B%3Cspan+lang%3D%22en%22+dir%3D%22auto%22%3E%C3%89tienne+Balibar%3C%2Fspan%3E%7D-%3C%2Fspan%3E%EF%BC%89%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E&amp;rft.btitle=%E3%80%8A%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-all+%22+data-orig-title%3D%22%E9%96%B1%E8%AE%80%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC%E8%AB%96%22+data-lang-code%3D%22en%22+data-lang-name%3D%22%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%22+data-foreign-title%3D%22Reading+Capital%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-page%22%3E%E9%96%B1%E8%AE%80%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC%E8%AB%96%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22noprint+ilh-comment%22%3E%EF%BC%88%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-lang%22%3E%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-colon%22%3E%EF%BC%9A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-link%22%3E-%7B%3Cspan+lang%3D%22en%22+dir%3D%22auto%22%3EReading+Capital%3C%2Fspan%3E%7D-%3C%2Fspan%3E%EF%BC%89%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%E3%80%8B%EF%BC%88%5Bhttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.marxists.org%2Freference%2Farchive%2Falthusser%2F1968%2Freading-capital%2F+Reading+Capital%5D%EF%BC%89&amp;rft.date=2009-06-09&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-1844673476&amp;rft.place=%E8%8B%B1%E5%9C%8B%E5%80%AB%E6%95%A6&amp;rft.pub=Verso+Books&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Farchive.org%2Fdetails%2Freadingcapital0000alth_z2w7&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span> <span class="error citation-comment" style="font-size:100%">网址－维基内链冲突 (<a <li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span> <cite class="citation book">Shlomo Avineri. <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=UG2bcaExDGkC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">The Social and Political Thought of Karl Marx</a>. 英国剑桥: <a href="/wiki/%E5%8A%8D%E6%A9%8B%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="剑桥大学出版社">剑桥大学出版社</a>. 1968年1月1日. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0521096195" title="Special:网络书源/978-0521096195"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span> 978-0521096195</a>. （原始内容<a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210103023618/https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=UG2bcaExDGkC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false" rel="nofollow">存档</a>于2021年1月3日）.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;rft.au=Shlomo+Avineri&amp;rft.btitle=The+Social+and+Political+Thought+of+Karl+Marx&amp;rft.date=1968-01-01&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-0521096195&amp;rft.place=%E8%8B%B1%E5%9C%8B%E5%8A%8D%E6%A9%8B&amp;rft.pub=%E5%8A%8D%E6%A9%8B%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com.tw%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DUG2bcaExDGkC%26printsec%3Dfrontcover%26hl%3Dzh-TW%23v%3Donepage%26q%26f%3Dfalse&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook"><span style="display:none;"> </span></span></li>

<h2><span id=".E5.A4.96.E9.83.A8.E9.80.A3.E7.B5.90"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="外部连结">外部连结</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;action=edit&amp;section=36" title="编辑章节：外部连结">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>

<td colspan="2" style="padding-bottom:0.75em;border-bottom:1px solid #aaa;text-align:center;"><div style="clear:both;">从维基百科的<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Wikipedia:%E5%A7%8A%E5%A6%B9%E8%AE%A1%E5%88%92" title="Wikipedia:姊妹计划">姊妹计划</a><br/>了解更多有关<br/>“<b>卡尔·马克思</b>”的内容</div>
</td></tr>
<tr style="height:25px;">

<table cellspacing="0" class="navbox" style="border-spacing:0"><tbody><tr><td style="padding:2px"><table cellspacing="0" class="nowraplinks collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="3" scope="col"><div class="plainlinks hlist navbar mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:%E9%A9%AC%E6%81%A9%E8%91%97%E4%BD%9C" title="Template:马恩着作"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none" title="查看该模板">查</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:%E9%A9%AC%E6%81%A9%E8%91%97%E4%BD%9C" title="Template talk:马恩着作"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none" title="讨论该模板">论</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://zh.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:%E9%A9%AC%E6%81%A9%E8%91%97%E4%BD%9C&amp;action=edit"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none" title="编辑该模板">编</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div style="font-size:110%"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%8D%A1%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D" title="卡尔·马克思">卡尔·马克思</a>和<a href="/wiki/%E5%BC%97%E9%87%8C%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C%E5%B8%8C%C2%B7%E6%81%A9%E6%A0%BC%E6%96%AF" title="弗里德里希·恩格斯">弗里德里希·恩格斯</a>着作</div></th></tr><tr style="height:2px"><td colspan="3"></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row">马克思</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;;"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em"></div><table cellspacing="0" class="nowraplinks navbox-subgroup" style="border-spacing:0"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="padding-left:0em;padding-right:0em;"><div style="padding:0em 0.75em;"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC%E8%AB%96" title="资本论">资本论</a></div></th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;;"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Das Kapital, Volume I" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="资本论·第一卷"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC%E8%AB%96%C2%B7%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E5%8D%B7&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="资本论·第一卷（页面不存在）">资本论·第一卷</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Das_Kapital,_Volume_I" title="en:Das Kapital, Volume I"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Das Kapital, Volume I</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1867年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Das Kapital, Volume II" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="资本论·第二卷"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC%E8%AB%96%C2%B7%E7%AC%AC%E4%BA%8C%E5%8D%B7&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="资本论·第二卷（页面不存在）">资本论·第二卷</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Das_Kapital,_Volume_II" title="en:Das Kapital, Volume II"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Das Kapital, Volume II</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1885年，死后出版）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Das Kapital, Volume III" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="资本论·第三卷"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%B3%87%E6%9C%AC%E8%AB%96%C2%B7%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%89%E5%8D%B7&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="资本论·第三卷（页面不存在）">资本论·第三卷</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Das_Kapital,_Volume_III" title="en:Das Kapital, Volume III"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Das Kapital, Volume III</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1894年，死后出版）</span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr style="height:2px"><td colspan="2"></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="padding-left:0em;padding-right:0em;"><div style="padding:0em 0.75em;">其他着作</div></th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;;"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">《<a href="/wiki/%E8%A0%8D%E5%AD%90%E5%92%8C%E8%B2%BB%E9%87%8C%E5%85%8B%E6%96%AF" title="蝎子和费里克斯">蝎子和费里克斯</a>》（1837年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Oulanem" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="奥兰尼姆"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%A5%A7%E8%98%AD%E5%B0%BC%E5%A7%86&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="奥兰尼姆（页面不存在）">奥兰尼姆</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oulanem" title="en:Oulanem"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Oulanem</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1839年）</span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Sassulitsch-Brief" data-lang-code="de" data-lang-name="德语" data-orig-title="给薇·伊·查苏利奇的覆信"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%B5%A6%E8%96%87%C2%B7%E4%BC%8A%C2%B7%E6%9F%A5%E8%98%87%E5%88%A9%E5%A5%87%E7%9A%84%E8%A6%86%E4%BF%A1&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="给薇·伊·查苏利奇的覆信（页面不存在）">给薇·伊·查苏利奇的覆信</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">德语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sassulitsch-Brief" title="de:Sassulitsch-Brief"><span dir="auto" lang="de">Sassulitsch-Brief</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1881年）</span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Marx's notebooks on the history of technology" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="卡尔·马克思的技术史札记"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E7%88%BE%C2%B7%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D%E7%9A%84%E6%8A%80%E8%A1%93%E5%8F%B2%E6%9C%AD%E8%A8%98&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="卡尔·马克思的技术史札记（页面不存在）">技术史札记</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marx%27s_notebooks_on_the_history_of_technology" title="en:Marx's notebooks on the history of technology"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Marx's notebooks on the history of technology</span></a></span>）</span></span>》</span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table><div></div></td><td class="navbox-image" rowspan="9" style="width:0%;padding:0px 0px 0px 2px"><div><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Marx_and_Engels.jpg"><img alt="Marx and Engels.jpg" data-file-height="438" data-file-width="500" decoding="async" height="131" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/79/Marx_and_Engels.jpg/150px-Marx_and_Engels.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/79/Marx_and_Engels.jpg/225px-Marx_and_Engels.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/79/Marx_and_Engels.jpg/300px-Marx_and_Engels.jpg 2x" width="150"/></a></div></td></tr><tr style="height:2px"><td colspan="3"></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row">恩格斯</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;;"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">《<a href="/wiki/%E5%9B%BD%E6%B0%91%E7%BB%8F%E6%B5%8E%E5%AD%A6%E6%89%B9%E5%88%A4%E5%A4%A7%E7%BA%B2" title="国民经济学批判大纲">国民经济学批判大纲</a>》（1844年）</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="The Condition of the Working Class in England" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="英国工人阶级状况"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%8B%B1%E5%9C%8B%E5%B7%A5%E4%BA%BA%E9%9A%8E%E7%B4%9A%E7%8B%80%E6%B3%81&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="英国工人阶级状况（页面不存在）">英国工人阶级状况</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Condition_of_the_Working_Class_in_England" title="en:The Condition of the Working Class in England"><span dir="auto" lang="en">The Condition of the Working Class in England</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1845年）</span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">《<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="The Peasant War in Germany" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="德国农民战争 (恩格斯着作)"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%BE%B7%E5%9C%8B%E8%BE%B2%E6%B0%91%E6%88%B0%E7%88%AD_(%E6%81%A9%E6%A0%BC%E6%96%AF%E8%91%97%E4%BD%9C)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="德国农民战争 (恩格斯着作)（页面不存在）">德国农民战争</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Peasant_War_in_Germany" title="en:The Peasant War in Germany"><span dir="auto" lang="en">The Peasant War in Germany</span></a></span>）</span></span>》（1850年）</span></li>

<ul><li><a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%9E%E6%AD%B7%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%AF%C2%B7%E6%89%98%E5%85%8B%E7%B6%AD%E7%88%BE" title="亚历西斯·托克维尔">阿列克西·托克维尔</a></li>

<ul class="vector-menu-content-list"><li class="selected vector-tab-noicon mw-list-item" id="ca-view"><a href="/wiki/%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D"><span>阅读</span></a></li><li class="vector-tab-noicon mw-list-item" id="ca-edit"><a accesskey="e" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;action=edit" title="编辑本页[e]"><span>编辑</span></a></li><li class="vector-tab-noicon mw-list-item" id="ca-history"><a accesskey="h" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%8D%A1%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E9%A9%AC%E5%85%8B%E6%80%9D&amp;action=history" title="本页面的早前版本。[h]"><span>查看历史</span></a></li></ul>
